import React from 'react'; import FontAwsome from 'react-fontawesome'; import {calcTime, convertMovney } from '../../helpers'; import { StyledMovieInfoBar } from '../styles/StyledMovieInfoBar'; const MovieInfoBar = ({ time, budget, revenue }) =>
Running Time: {calcTime(time)}
Running Time: {calcTime(time)}
Running Time: {calcTime(time)}
export default MovieInfoBar;
